meanings.definition: The quality of being able to accurately assess situations or people and turn this to one's advantage.
meanings.sent1: Her astuteness in business allowed her to make wise investments.
meanings.sent2: His astuteness in negotiations always gave him the upper hand.
meanings.sent3: The detective's astuteness in solving cases made him the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: Her astuteness was like a sharp sword, cutting through deception effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The king's astuteness in diplomacy kept his kingdom safe from wars.

meanings.definition: The ability to make quick, clever decisions or judgments.
meanings.sent1: The athlete's astuteness on the field helped him score the winning goal.
meanings.sent2: Her astuteness in puzzles always amazed her friends.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed astuteness in catching the mouse by pretending to sleep.
meanings.sent4: His astuteness was a beacon of light in the darkness of uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's astuteness in understanding her students' needs made her classes enjoyable.
